name: BCNGotic

reviews.text: Our family of four just returned from a 6-day stay in Barcelona at the BCN Gotic. Based on the reviews here I booked at place here. But just before leaving I noticed I was at the Rosello property. Because my wife had a conference near the Argenteria location and a friends had booked nearby we asked to change. They were very nice about accommodating the request.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: The Argenteria location is right near Jaume 1 metro station, across Laetana from the Gothic quarter. The location was central to all of Barcelona. We could walk to the beach in Barceloneta in 15 minutes, or up to Place Catalyuna in about the same.
reviews.title: BCNgotic has space,value and location

reviews.text: The apartments are great (we stayed in 2 different ones). They were attractive, well-kept, spacious and well-furnished. For a family this is almost perfect. Our friends paid more for their small hotel room nearby at the H10 (there were only 2 of them).
reviews.title: You Won't go wrong

reviews.text: About the only downside is that as a self-catering place you have to rustle up your own breakfast. But there is a bakery across the street, small stores within a block or two, and an amazing market about 10 minutes away, so it was never any bother. There are so restaurants providing lunch and dinner options we didn't want to cook for those. There were lots of tapas, paella and gelato options within a couple of blocks.
reviews.title: Excellent Apartment in Barcellona

reviews.text: I have stayed in and recommended BCNgotic three times now. I don't know another way to get three bedrooms in the heart of the old town for 76€/night.
reviews.title: Fabulous Stay!

reviews.text: vWe had apartment 11 on the 1st floor and could not have been happier. We were greeted by Mar, who showed us around the apartment and gave us the keys. Mar was lovely and spoke English very well which meant everything was clear.
reviews.title: immaculately clean apartments in great location

reviews.text: The apartment was immaculately clean when we arrived. In fact, I couldn't believe how clean it seemed I went hunting for dust and couldn't find a spec.
reviews.title: Great place for a long stay!

reviews.text: We were there for a Thursday - Monday so experienced how lively the area can been on a Friday and Saturday night and although there was quite a bit of noise (mainly just hustle and bustle of people talking at the restaurants and bars) when the windows were open, when they were shut we were not bothered by the sound at all and slept fine.
reviews.title: Great Location Clean and Affordable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing that I would really have liked to have had in this apartment was a clothes dryer, however it did have a small area outside the kitchen for hanging clothes, so it was just a matter of planning ahead to get the washing hung out before we went out for the day.
reviews.title: Loved the BCNGotic

reviews.text: We would stay here again in a heartbeat and recommend to anyone looking for apartment accommodation. BCNGotic lived up to the high expectations we had from reading the reviews on trip advisor.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: We have stopped in these apartments four times now and will always recommend them. We have to our friends and they feel the same. Perfect location, easy access to everywhere of this beautiful city . The apartments are always clean and bright each having its own style. The service is excellent and friendly I would not think of staying any where else. Highly recommend these apartments I know we will be back again !!!!
reviews.title: Consistently amazing

reviews.text: Top location smack bang in the middle of Barcelona. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby, as well as a supermarket just opposite. Everything from Barri Gotic to the Ramblas and Barceloneta is walking distance.
reviews.title: Excellent value and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at one of their apartments with 4 bedrooms, two bathrooms and a terrace and everything was perfect.Especially because of the the price I would definitely choose BCNgotic for my next trip. Great value!
reviews.title: Lovely Apartment in a Great Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel in April 2013 with my husband. Loved the location. Mar and Martin were very helpful and friendly. Very clean and spacious apartment - we had 3 bedrooms. The only thing negative was the weather - it was raining almost every day except our last day when the sun came out. We were so happy and went for a long walk in the Diagonal Mar area. Would highly recommend to fellow travellers!
reviews.title: Great Barcelona Apt.

reviews.text: Superb apartment in a great location. Clean, modern, and quiet for the most part. Best HVAC (air conditioning) I have ever enjoyed in a hotel--silent and cools (or heats) the whole place in minutes. Great people watching from the window (we had room 14), and virtually no discernible noise from the street with the window closed. The only noise you might hear are from the neighbors--the sounds of dropping balls or marbles and dragging stuff across the floor overhead could be heard at night from time to time. Martin and Mar were flexible and even let us check out late the day had to catch a night train. All in all excellent.
reviews.title: Second time with BCNGotic - excellent

reviews.text: The apartment is located in the old city in a very nice neighbourhood and at night is quit! The restaurant under the apartment has delicious tapes, a small supermarket and a bakery are nearby.
reviews.title: Very good apartment and location

reviews.text: The apartment is clean, comfortable and a has nice interior. We arrived early in the morning and left late in the afternoon the language could we left in the office, great service.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: Thanks to Mar Font and her team we had a pleased stay in Barcelona
reviews.title: Great apartment in a fantastic location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked BCN apartments on a personal recommendation and were not dissapointed. We even managed to get a larger apartment at the same rate at the last minute thanks to Martin. For the 2 of us, we had 3 beds, 2 baths, lounge/dining room, kitchenette and patio - fabulous for entertaining our friends who we flew to BCN to meet up with who came over on a transatlantic cruise and were staying in an Hotel on the Parallel. God where they shocked when they came to our apartment for cocktails and said they would also use BCNGotic in the future as they cruise over to BCN alot. There hotel was more expensive and offered a very small room.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Barcelona

reviews.text: The apartment was well kept, very clean and in a fab location. Good supermarket just behind the building for all your provisions, very close to the Metro and within easy walking distance of the best parts that Barcelona has to offer. It was our 6th visit to the city always having stayed in 4 class hotel establishments before at a much higher price than BCNGotic.
reviews.title: What more could you want?

description: We have a group of apartments located in the same building, built in the first quarter of the last century, and that have been carefully renovated respecting the original structure of the building to the maximum. They are situated right in the historic centre of Barcelona, where you can enjoy a dynamic, cheerful, bohemian neighbourhood, 150 metres from the sea,
